entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 04:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: N 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
